text: @michaelgove @Conservatives @MarosSefcovic We will fall out of the EU without any deal.. without any trade relationships.. making the recovery from Coronavirus and the economic outlook weaker than ever.. if that’s the case why are so proud you’ve just ruined any prospect of future growth and economic success!
